QuestData.Title: Seize the Ambassador
QuestData.Description: The ambassador's betrayal will long haunt me. You must arrest him before he can do further harm, or worse, before he can escape and start planning the next attack. Ironforge is not safe with Ambassador Slaghammer free inside the city.$B$BTake these manacles and go to the Dark Iron embassy. It's just to the north of the High Seat, around the rim of the Great Forge. Arrest Ambassador Slaghammer and return with him.
QuestData.AreaDescription: Arrest Ambassador Slaghammer and bring him to the High Seat
QuestData.LogDescription: Go to the Dark Iron Embassy and use the Sturdy Manacles to arrest Ambassador Slaghammer.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Return to Moira Bronzebeard at the High Seat in Ironforge.
QuestData.RewardText: The ambassador will trouble us no more. He is not the only Dark Iron dwarf whose heart still belongs to Twilight's Hammer. We must remember that and remain vigilant against their schemes, else my son will inherit only ruins and ashes.
